chunks.text:
mar.Alshashaa@loccitane.me>, Randa Escondose <Randa.Escondose@loccitane.me>, Daniele Bueno <Daniele.Bueno@loccitane.me> 
Subject: RE: RSO (UAE) - STORE CLOSURE | (L'Occitane Marina Mall Abu Dhabi) 


Dear All,

Good morning,

 

Please be reminded of L’Occitane Marina Mall closure timeline to ensure smooth processes and surrender to the mall on time.

 

*	Last trading date is 9th December and hoarding will be installed by mall contractor after trading hours.
*	@Iryna STETSENKO <mailto:Iryna.Stetsenko@loccitane.me>  please ensure all stock transfers are completed maximum by 11th December & pulled out and make sure handing over store keys to mall management office maximum by 12th December.
*	@Iryna STETSENKO <mailto:Iryna.Stetsenko@loccitane.me>  cash float plus petty cash to be deposited together is separate envelope from cash sale that will be collected on 10th December and share collection slip @Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  & @Retail Operations UAE <mailto:Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com> .
*	@Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  please ensure scheduling last cash collection on 10th December and permanently cease the service.
*	@Iryna STETSENKO <mailto:Iryna.Stetsenko@loccitane.me>  manual invoice books, 2 credit card machines & Alipay device to be sent to account department, HO1 attention @Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com> .
*	@Fawzia Isse <mailto:Fawzia.Isse@chalhoub.com>  Please ensure water dispenser and water bottles collection takes place on 11th December.
*	@Jayesh Jayadevan <mailto:Jayesh.Jayadevan@chalhoub.com>  @Faisal Abdukunju <mailto:Faisal.Abdukunju@chalhoub.com>  @Joseph Diaz <mailto:Joseph.Diaz@chalhoub.com>  please arrange IT equipment dismantle and collection in coordination with @Iryna STETSENKO <mailto:Iryna.Stetsenko@loccitane.me>  maximum by 11th December.

eph Diaz <mailto:Joseph.Diaz@chalhoub.com>  please arrange IT equipment dismantle and collection in coordination with @Iryna STETSENKO <mailto:Iryna.Stetsenko@loccitane.me>  maximum by 11th December.
*	@Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>  @Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  please arrange CCTV system removal after all stocks are pulled out maximum 12th December in the morning.
*	@Fawzia Isse <mailto:Fawzia.Isse@chalhoub.com>  Please apply for ADDC clearance letter on 12th December and obtain the letter that shall be submitted to mall management no later than 23rd December.
*	@Connie Madeira <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>  please apply for internet & Etisalat clearance letter on 12th December and obtain the letter that shall be submitted to mall management no later than 23rd December.

 

For further clarification, please never hesitate contacting @Retail Operations UAE <mailto:Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com> .

 

Best regards,

 

 

 

MOHAMED BATA​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

ABU DHABI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 563 2000

+971508158454

CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=BEWDxsMmF0bRspi2XLN4yBgh%2BxzWIcQN7FUkCusuBZU%3D&reserved=0> 



From: Retail Operations UAE 
Sent: Thursday, November 21, 2024 3:14 PM
Subject: RSO (UAE) - STORE CLOSURE | (L'Occitane Marina Mall Abu Dhabi) 
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Please be informed that the last trading date of L’Occitane Marina Mall Abu Dhabi  will be on 9th December 2024 at 10PM.

 

The hoarding installation will commence on 9th December 2024 at 10PM. (After Mall Trading Hours).

 

We have prepared the Store Closure checklist for this store to ensure completion of all tasks prior our handover to the mall. Each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on-time. 

 

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach me 050 8158454.

 

Best regards,

Mohamed Bata.
